about.title: Meet Caroline Hines
about.body:
Hi, I’m Caroline — the therapist behind Pure Glow Wellness. After years working in finance and insurance, I reached a turning point: I wanted to build a life and career centred around calm, connection, and meaningful wellbeing.

I now offer restorative facials, natural skincare support, and gentle wellness treatments from my quiet private studio here in Marple. My approach is calm, personal, and designed with women in mind — especially those navigating mid-life changes, stress, or recovery.
about.quote: Your facial is never rushed or routine. I adapt everything to your skin, your comfort, and how you want to feel.
about.journey_body: This space is a result of my own shift into wellness later in life. I’m continuing my training, including women’s personal training and massage therapy, so I can support clients in a more holistic way — mind, skin, and body.
